code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const FilterAdaptation=_ref=>{let{filters,onFilterChange}=_ref;const[selectedFilters,setSelectedFilters]=useState([]);const handleFilterChange=(filter,checked)=>{if(checked){setSelectedFilters([...selectedFilters,filter]);}else{setSelectedFilters(selectedFilters.filter(selectedFilter=>selectedFilter!==filter));}onFilterChange(filter,checked);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"FilterAdaptation",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"subtitle",children:"ADAPTATION"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"carousel-container",id:"containerAdaptation",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"carouselAdaptation",className:"carousel",children:filters.map((filter,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"carousel-item ".concat(selectedFilters.includes(filter)?"selected":""),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{className:"AdaptationLabel ".concat(selectedFilters.includes(filter)?"selected":""),htmlFor:"AdaptationInput".concat(index),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox",value:filter,onChange:e=>handleFilterChange(filter,e.target.checked),id:"AdaptationInput".concat(index)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{style:{color:selectedFilters.includes(filter)?"black":"inherit"},children:filter})]})},filter))})})]});};export default FilterAdaptation;
